actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations of the Committee on Governmental Affairs in In The Matter of Provident Life and Accident Insurance Company.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations of the Committee on Governmental Affairs in the matter of Provident Life and Accident Insurance Company.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations of the Committee on Governmental Affairs in In The Matter of Provident Life and Accident Insurance Company.
